sources.name: The Odds API

guard_rails.name: no_hardcoded_odds
guard_rails.rule: NEVER use hardcoded -110. ALL prices must come from source.

guard_rails.name: spread_sign_convention
guard_rails.rule: Spread signs must match: negative = home favored, positive = away favored.

guard_rails.name: odds_price_ranges
guard_rails.rule: American odds must be within [-500, +500] range or null (no line).

guard_rails.name: no_duplicate_games
guard_rails.rule: Each unique (home_team, away_team, market, game_date, game_id) appears at most once.

guard_rails.name: odds_cst_date_standardization
guard_rails.rule: All odds timestamps must be normalized to Central Time (CST/CDT via America/Chicago) in canonical storage. No naive/local timestamps.

guard_rails.name: odds_freshness_by_season
guard_rails.rule: Current season must have odds within 48 hours. Historical: within 10 days.

sources.notes: Primary odds source. Uses /sports/basketball_ncaa endpoint with closing lines.

sources.name: ESPN API

guard_rails.name: complete_score_requirement
guard_rails.rule: Game must have BOTH home_score and away_score, or null for future games.

guard_rails.name: reasonable_score_ranges
guard_rails.rule: College basketball scores must be 0-200 (1-200 for completed games).

guard_rails.name: team_resolution_mandatory
guard_rails.rule: All team names must resolve to canonical names. NO unresolved names in final data.

guard_rails.name: date_standardization
guard_rails.rule: All game dates must be normalized to Central Time (CST/CDT via America/Chicago) in ISO 8601 format. No other local timezones.

sources.notes: Primary scores source. D1 games from ESPN schedule.

sources.name: Barttorvik Ratings

guard_rails.name: prior_season_ratings_only
guard_rails.rule: For season N games, use ratings from season N-1. NO same-season ratings (prevents leakage).

guard_rails.name: rating_value_ranges
guard_rails.rule: Efficiency ratings must be 50-150. Tempo 60-80. Anything else is corruption.

guard_rails.name: team_coverage_by_season
guard_rails.rule: Season must have ratings for 95%+ of D1 teams (~360 teams).

sources.notes: Primary ratings source. Pre-season ratings available Oct 1. Daily updates starting Nov 1.

sources.name: NCAAR (ncaahoopR)

guard_rails.name: ncaamr_schema_required
guard_rails.rule: Box scores must have: game_id, team, opp, points, home_away, date, minutes_played.

guard_rails.name: ncaamr_game_matching
guard_rails.rule: Each box_score row must match exactly ONE game in espn_api scores via (date, home_team, away_team).

guard_rails.name: ncaamr_team_consistency
guard_rails.rule: Team names in ncaahoopR must match ESPN canonical names exactly.

guard_rails.name: ncaamr_date_standardization
guard_rails.rule: All box score dates must be normalized to Central Time (CST/CDT via America/Chicago).

sources.notes: Rich box-score data (player stats, minutes). Currently used for feature engineering only (build_consolidated_master.py). NOT actively ingested.

sources.name: Kaggle NCAA Dataset

guard_rails.name: kaggle_limited_scope
guard_rails.rule: Kaggle has NCAA tournament games ONLY (68 games in March). NOT regular season. Verify date range.

guard_rails.name: kaggle_no_odds
guard_rails.rule: Kaggle dataset has NO odds data. Cannot use for backtesting without external odds merge.

guard_rails.name: kaggle_team_resolution
guard_rails.rule: Kaggle team names MUST resolve to canonical names (often need manual mapping).

guard_rails.name: kaggle_date_standardization
guard_rails.rule: All tournament dates must be normalized to Central Time (CST/CDT via America/Chicago).

sources.notes: Tournament scores ONLY (not regular season). Local CSV files. NOT synced to Azure. NOT currently used in backtest pipeline.
